disambiguationpagelinks:
{{doc-special|DisambiguationPageLinks}}
The special page shows all pages with links needing disambiguation.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-disamb: Prompt for the checkbox in VisualEditor to mark the page as a disambiguation page.
tag-disambiguator-link-added: Change tag for edits that add links to disambiguation pages
disambiguator-notification-question: First sentence of the notification message shown when the user types a link to a disambiguation page.
disambiguator-notification-summary:
The body of the notification message shown when the user types a link to a disambiguation page.

Related to this message: {{msg-mw|wikieditor-toolbar-tool-link-int-target-status-disambig}}.

These messages should be phrased similarly.

Parameters:
* $1 - the page that was linked to. The word 'not' can be emphasized, but does not need to be.
disambiguator-review-link: Label for the 'Review link' link in the notification popup. When clicked, the relevant wikitext that links to a disambiguation page is selected. The word 'review' in this context is a verb.
